features.title: A Perfect Experience on Any Device
features.description: It's not just about your website 'looking good' on a mobile device. It's about providing a seamless and fast user experience, regardless of the device. We achieve this through:
points: **Mobile-First Approach:** We design for the smallest screens first, ensuring a solid foundation, and then scale up for larger devices.
**Performance Optimization:** We optimize images, and leverage modern frameworks to ensure your site loads quickly on any connection.
**Cross-Browser & Device Testing:** We rigorously test on a wide range of browsers and devices to guarantee a consistent experience for all your users.
**SEO Friendly:** A responsive design is a crucial factor for Google's mobile-first indexing, which we prioritize.

features.title: Security as a Foundation, Not an Extra
features.description: Your peace of mind is our priority. That's why we integrate a multi-layered defense strategy:
points: **Encrypted Connections:** All sites are delivered with SSL certificates to ensure private and secure communication.

**Advanced Form Protection:** We use serverless functions (e.g., AWS Lambda) to process form submissions with services like Resend, combined with Cloudflare Turnstile to block bots without annoying CAPTCHAs.
**Dependency Monitoring:** We constantly monitor and update all software dependencies to protect against the latest known vulnerabilities.
**Robust Security Headers:** We configure advanced HTTP headers (like CSP) to provide strong protection against common attacks such as Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).

features.title: Built to Be Found
features.description: A website that no one finds doesn't meet its objective. That's why all our projects include a solid foundation of technical SEO: Semantic HTML so search engines understand your content, performance optimization for better Google rankings, and essential meta tags and attributes for visibility from day one.

features.title: A Partner in Your Digital Journey
features.description: Your website's launch is just the beginning. We offer clear and direct communication to resolve any questions. All our projects include a 30-day warranty to fix any technical issues. And if you need long-term peace of mind, we have maintenance plans tailored to your needs.
